name: vehicle-inspection-app

scripts.clean: rm -rf .next node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.test:build: npm run verify && npm run build
scripts.deploy:verify: npm run clean:install && npm run test:build
scripts.backup: tar -czf backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz components contexts data utils pages *.js *.json
scripts.postinstall: echo '‚úÖ Dependencias instaladas. Ejecuta npm run verify para verificar el proyecto'
scripts.test:domain: echo "Testing domain entities..." && node -e "console.log("‚úÖ Domain tests placeholder")"
scripts.validate:domain: node -e "console.log("üîç Validating domain structure..."); console.log("‚úÖ Domain validation placeholder")"
scripts.test:application: echo "Testing application layer..." && node -e "console.log("‚úÖ Application tests placeholder")"
scripts.validate:application: node -e "console.log("üîç Validating application structure..."); console.log("‚úÖ Application validation placeholder")"
scripts.verify:phase1: node -e "console.log("ÔøΩ Verificando Fase 1..."); try { require("./src/infrastructure/index.js"); console.log("‚úÖ Fase 1 verificada"); } catch(e) { console.error("‚ùå Error en Fase 1:", e.message); process.exit(1); }"
